channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 23:40 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community and Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 23:40 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community and Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
